definitions.definition: ( video games , trademark ) A Japanese multinational company that develops, publishes and releases both video games and video game consoles .

main_definition: ( video games , trademark ) A Japanese multinational company that develops, publishes and releases both video games and video game consoles .

definitions.definition: A Nintendo Entertainment System , or other video game system made by Nintendo.
examples: Wanna play on my Nintendo after school?

definitions.definition: Any video game console, especially by those not familiar with video games.

main_definition: ( video games ) A Nintendo Entertainment System , or other video game system made by Nintendo.
secondary_definitions: ( video games , by extension ) Any video game console, especially by those not familiar with video games.
( loosely ) Any popular product or activity.
